title: Curfew to Be Imposed in Miami Beach Neighborhood Following Weekend of Unrest
sub_head: Shootings during raucous spring-break partying prompt emergency declaration, Thursday-Monday curfew in South Beach
body:
Officials in Miami Beach, Fla., said they would declare a state of emergency and impose a curfew in the South Beach neighborhood after two shootings over the weekend left five people injured there.
The city has grappled in recent years with raucous crowds during the weekslong spring-break period that have on occasion descended into violence despite stepped-up law enforcement measures. Residents have clamored for police to get the partying under control, but authorities have struggled to rein it in.
